title: Ranked 5's New Team, Members looking for a Semi Serious ranked team can join
body:
Want a ranked 5's team that's semi serious (not gonna rage but not gonna troll either)
Don't really mind what the ranks are, anywhere from bronze - gold is fine and if anyone higher doesn't mind playing with lower elos that's fine as well 
_**We use Teamspeak 3 for communication not skype or curse voice!**_

Comment here or add "Mr Tickles" (without the "") in game if you wanna join
Comment the lane and rank as well as your IGN so i can add you

Cheers

(Oceania Server)

replies.body:
Ign: GangreneElbow
Age: 21
Role: Support
Main Champ: Nidalee{{champion:76}}  > Sona{{champion:37}}  > Nami{{champion:267}}  > Leona{{champion:89}}  > Nautilus{{champion:111}}  (Can play any AP support, and most tanks)
Division: Silver 2 Last season (fucked up my provisionals this time around, I hate solo Queue)
Reasons why you want to join: Looking for a dedicated team to be able to play competitively, regularly.
Some other stuff like weaknesses: I play way too aggressively in lane, this either goes amazingly well, or we get camped and feed. 7/10 times Botlane ends up 5/0ea going into group phase. My Lane phase ward presence is great, but group warding and objective vision needs work. Can easilly shift to a Support/Carry in a game with a ludens.{{item:2043}}

Hey mate,

I'm a Bronze 1 (currently in silver promos) player who mains support but can play all but mid decently.
Play a variety of champions, most meta picks and a few offpicks from time to time.

Have Teamspeak and a mic and am looking to play in a team to improve and have fun

ign: aSilentNinjaa
